<div align="center">

## almond-mailhog

</div>

<div align="center">

    Almond devs email testing application server

  [![Almond](./readme.svg)](https://almond-re-staging.herokuapp.com/)

  #### Simple but complicated mail sending

</div>

## Description
This is a safe email testing with mailhog server

## Run on docker

```sh
make start
```

## Install

```sh
yarn install
```

## Usage

```sh
yarn run start
```
